item.title: EU's top diplomat rejects Russian claims of Ukrainian attack on government sites
item.description: It comes as Russia releases video which it claims shows a downed Ukrainian drone launched at one of Putin's residences.

item.title: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world
item.description: From spectacular firework displays to chilly sea dips, nations celebrate the start of 2026.

item.title: Fireworks, drums and light shows: How the world is welcoming 2026
item.description: Countries around the world celebrated the new year with colourful shows and long-held traditions.

item.title: Israel to bar 37 aid groups as UK and EU warn of severe impact in Gaza
item.description: Israel's move is criticised by 10 countries, which say the new registration rules for international NGOs are "restrictive" and "unacceptable".

item.title: Finnish police seize ship suspected of sabotaging undersea cable
item.description: Police arrested 14 crew members on the ship sailing from St Petersburg, Russia, to the Israeli port of Haifa.
